title: Seoul: North Korea launches ballistic missile toward sea
description: South Korea says North Korea has launched a ballistic missile off the North’s east coast

title: No Russia-Ukraine peace talks expected this year, U.S. leak shows
description: The Ukraine war is expected to spill into 2024 with neither side notching victory and both refusing to negotiate, U.S. intelligence officials surmise.

title: OAS rights court rules against Mexico on no-bail policy
description: The Inter American Human Rights Court has ruled that Mexico violated the rights of two men who were held in pre-trial detention for 17 years before being convicted of homicide

title: Gulf nations Bahrain, Qatar to restore ties after blockade
description: The Gulf nations of Bahrain and Qatar have agreed to restore diplomatic relations

title: OAS panel urges El Salvador to restore suspended rights
description: The Inter American Commission on Human Rights is urging the government of El Salvador to restore all the rights suspended under an “emergency” anti-gang decree that is now entering its second year

title: Divided court leaves constitutional issue at Guantanamo unresolved
description: U.S. may not be allowed to keep a man imprisoned in Guantanamo Bay after he is no longer deemed a threat, but due process question remains

title: Makers of 'Elemental' explore family, tolerance and movement
description: “Elemental’’ director Peter Sohn says his parents ignited the spark for the upcoming Disney and Pixar animated film

title: Serbia denies it sent weapons to Ukraine, as leaked document claims
description: The country is among a handful in Europe that have not issued sanctions targeting Russia over its invasion of Ukraine.

title: Alleged boat pilot charged in English Channel migrant deaths
description: A man who allegedly piloted a small boat packed with migrants that capsized crossing the English Channel in December has been charged with four counts of manslaughter

title: New floods in Burundi displace thousands of families
description: More than 4,000 families have been displaced in the last week due to floods in Burundi’s western region of Gatumba

title: An Escobar hippo killed in highway collision in Colombia
description: Environmental authorities in Colombia say a hippopotamus descended from animals illegally brought to Colombia by the late drug kingpin Pablo Escobar has died in a collision with an SUV near Escobar’s hacienda

title: Alicia Keys reimagines iconic hit for 'Bridgerton' prequel
description: At the famous Abbey Road Studios in London to present a special selection of songs recorded in spatial audio for Apple Music, Alicia Keys revealed another upcoming project

title: French investigative site claims Depardieu groped extras
description: A French investigative news website claims that the actor Gerard Depardieu has been accused of harassing, groping or sexually assaulting, mainly film extras

title: School massacres are no longer just an American problem
description: Brazil, which has suffered 11 attacks in the past eight months, worries that the carnage is only beginning.

title: C.I.A leak, sanctions highlight strained relations between U.S. and Hungary
description: U.S. Ambassador David Pressman expressed concerns over Hungary’s “eagerness” to continue ties with Russia.

title: Video of alleged beheading of Ukrainian soldier draws condemnation
description: An unverified video that appeared to show Russian soldiers beheading a Ukrainian prisoner of war was condemned by President Volodymyr Zelensky.

title: Missing woman rescued from submerged Jeep, Texas police say
description: Law enforcement in east Texas say a missing woman was rescued from a submerged vehicle, and taken to a nearby hospital

title: Prince Harry but not Meghan will attend King Charles III’s coronation
description: Speculation over whether the U.S.-based royals would attend the May 6 ceremony has heightened after Harry inveighed against his family in a memoir and Netflix documentary.

title: Where did leaked U.S. secrets appear? On a chat app popular with gamers.
description: Leaked documents from the Pentagon and intelligence about Ukraine appeared on Discord, a chat app popular with gamers.

title: Palace: Prince Harry to attend his father's May 6 coronation
description: Buckingham Palace says Prince Harry will attend the Coronation service of his father, King Charles III, at Westminster Abbey on May 6, setting aside months of speculation about his presence

title: Church: Israel limiting rights of 'Holy Fire' worshippers
description: The leaders of the Greek Orthodox Church say Israeli police are unfairly limiting worshippers’ right to celebrate the Easter “Holy Fire” ceremony in the ancient Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem

title: UN: Year is off to a deadly start for migrants crossing Med
description: The migration agency of the United Nations says the first three months of 2023 were the deadliest first quarter in six years for migrants crossing the central Mediterranean Sea in smugglers’ boats

title: 3 Sherpa climbers missing after falling on Mount Everest
description: Three Sherpa climbers are missing after falling into a deep crevasse on a treacherous section of Mount Everest just above the base camp

title: Firefighters battle to contain 2,500-acre forest fire in New Jersey
description: Only 10 percent of the forest fire dubbed Jimmy’s Waterhole Fire has been contained. Mandatory evacuations were issued in Manchester and Lakehurst townships.

title: Uzbek militants escape from detention in Indonesia; 2 dead
description: Police say three suspected Uzbek militants escaped from an immigration detention center in Indonesia’s capital after fatally stabbing an officer and seriously injuring four others

title: Syria and Tunisia restore diplomatic ties after a decade
description: State media says Syria will reopen its embassy in Tunisia after the North African country announced the appointment of a new ambassador to Damascus

title: China’s struggles with lab safety carry danger of another pandemic
description: Investigations show China is vulnerable to serious lab accidents, exposing problems that allowed deadly pathogens to escape in the past, and could well do so again.

title: Volcano spews ash cloud for 2nd day on Russia's Kamchatka
description: A massive volcanic eruption is spewing out ash for a second day on Russia’s far eastern Kamchatka Peninsula, throwing clouds of dust high into the sky and blanketing wide areas

title: Pope evokes cold-war replay, says leaders should avoid arms
description: Pope Francis has evoked memories of the 1960s Cold War and urged world leaders to use reason, not weapons

title: US envoy: Balkans 'poisoned' by Russian disinformation
description: A United States envoy on countering global disinformation says countries in the western Balkan region have been “pretty seriously poisoned” by Russia’s influence campaigns

title: Talban say there's no obstacles for UN work in Afghanistan
description: The Taliban’s chief spokesman denies there are obstacles for the U.N. to do its work in Afghanistan, even after barring Afghan women from working at the global body

title: How Bono helped bring peace to Northern Ireland
description: U2 burst onto the stage in Belfast and orchestrated one of the most iconic images associated with Northern Ireland's Good Friday Agreement.

title: IMF slashes cash-strapped Pakistan's growth outlook to 0.5%
description: The International Monetary Fund has slashed the growth outlook for cash-strapped Pakistan, forecasting the South Asian country’s fragile economy will grow just 0.5% this year, down from 6% in 2022

title: German police seize cooked bats from van on Belgian border
description: Authorities say German police seized cooked bats and nearly a ton of unrefrigerated fish when they stopped a van that had entered the country from Belgium

title: Ukrainian forces probe front lines for Russian weak spots
description: Ukrainians are short on ammunition, taking losses and waiting on weapons, but they're also testing Russia's vulnerabilities ahead of a counteroffensive.

title: Massive volcano eruption in Russia’s east leaves landscape covered in ash
description: Shiveluch is one of the biggest volcanoes on the sparsely populated Kamchatka peninsula. The eruption blew a plume of ash as high as 65,000 feet.

title: Japan is hostile for LGBTQ people, but attitudes are shifting. Slowly.
description: Japan is the only G-7 country not to recognize same-sex marriage, and its government is facing calls for action before the group's meeting in Hiroshima in May.

title: Musician Kauan Okamoto alleges talent manager assaulted him
description: When Johnny Kitagawa told one of the boys staying at his luxury house to go to bed early, everyone knew “it was your turn.”

title: As Ukraine war drags on, civilians' mental health needs rise
description: Huddled in the back of a café near the train station where a missile killed dozens of people nearly a year ago, Nastya takes slow, deliberate breaths to calm herself

title: Fishing regulators need more transparency, ocean groups say
description: More transparency in regional fisheries management organizations that were set up by the United Nations to measure and conserve fish populations — but are difficult to hold to account — is needed if fish species are to be protected, conservation agencies and fishing industries players say

title: Firing in Indian army station kills 4 soldiers
description: The Indian army says a firing incident inside a military station has killed at least four soldiers in northern India

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. vows to ‘turn over every rock’ to find source of intelligence leak
description: The European Parliament is also holding an inter-committee meeting with lawmakers from Kyiv regarding Ukraine’s potential accession to the European Union.

title: Divisions in Ethiopia’s ancient church pose new threat to war-weary country
description: Ethiopia's Orthodox Church has long helped bind the country together but is now struggling to resolve fissures among bishops from rival ethnic groups.

title: Mexican immigration agency chief to be charged in fatal fire
description: Mexico’s top immigration official will face criminal charges in a fire that killed 40 migrants last month

title: In Kerala, an aging trend bucks India's booming population
description: In the past 60 years, the percentage of people age 60 and over in India’s Kerala state has shot up from 5.1% to 16.5% — the highest proportion in any state

title: Bruce Haigh, Australian envoy who aided apartheid-era escape, dies at 77
description: Mr. Haigh's role in helping a journalist flee South Africa was recounted in the film "Cry Freedom."

title: Residents flee as cyclone approaches northwest Australia
description: Miners, cattle ranchers, tourists and Indigenous locals are evacuating from Australia’s remote northwest coast as an intensifying tropical cyclone approaches

title: Macron’s China trip turns into a European uproar
description: At the center of the controversy is an interview French President Emmanuel Macron gave that touched on Taiwan and China, saying Europe should not get “caught up in crises that are not ours.”
